EmailTemplate.name: 201908_EMEAI_Connectivity_Zurich1_KKO.201908_EMEAI_Confirmation_GoDirect_Connect
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed | GoDirect Connectivity Conference in Zurich
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
You're now registered for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming events. Here are the details you'll need:
Event: GoDirect Connectivity Conference Venue: Hilton Zurich Airport Hotel, Hohenbühlstrasse 10, 8152 Opfikon, Switzerland Time: 09:00 – 16:00, Thursday, November 21st, 2019 Room: Book a room at the preferential rate (220 CHF) via this link <[[https://secure3.hilton.com/en_US/hi/reservation/book.htm?ctyhocn=ZRHHITW&arrivalDay=20&arrivalMonth=11&arrivalYear=2019&departureDay=22&departureMonth=11&departureYear=2019&spec_plan=GHON02&datesFlex=false&cid=OM,WW,HILTONLINK,EN,DirectLink&fromId=HILTONLINKDIRECT]]>
Please contact Thomas.Gierlich@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Thomas.Gierlich@Honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
